description: Glissito is a trial version of Gliss, a simple puzzle/strategy game. This version contains 4 of the 20 levels. The game consists of colored blocks that are progressively placed on a square grid. You can move the blocks into another square on the grid if it's possible for them to glide there my moving only horizontally and/or vertically across adjacent spaces. After a certain number of blocks drop, the level increases. As the levels increase, the board becomes more restrictive, more blocks fall per level, and more colors appear. There are 4 levels in this demo version, and the game is over once no more moves can be made on a given level, or you complete both levels.
